forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The sun casts a gentle light over Downtown San Francisco, gracefully illuminating the city against a backdrop of vibrant blue sky. With temperatures currently hovering around a cool 55, a brisk west-northwest wind dances through the streets, bringing with it a refreshing touch of autumn crispness. While the day begins in the golden glow of sunlight, hints of a lazy marine layer can be spotted retreating towards the fringes, promising a mostly clear afternoon. 

As the day unfolds into a tranquil evening, temperatures will drop to a comfortable 44, inviting a cozy wrap of layers—perhaps a light jacket or a soft sweater to keep the chill at bay during twilight strolls through the charming neighborhoods. With the brisk air and radiant skies, it's a splendid day for a leisurely walk along the waterfront or perhaps exploring the nooks of hidden alleyways adorned with art. One might lose themselves in a favorite café, sipping something warm, savoring the essence of the day, where even the mundane feels beautifully serene.
